tweet: #CardanoFoundation as based in #Zug, #Switzerland is happy to announce that #Cardano is part of the @_CV_VC_ Top 50 again, and earned the title #unicorn, given out to projects who are currently valued at 1B or more. We continue to collaborate with partners in our #cryptovalley!

The Basho & Voltaire era of #Cardano will be an era of optimisation and treasury system, to provide the final piece required for the Cardano network to become a self-sustaining system. Interested in how all of eras of Cardano fit together? See it here:  https://t.co/t1kjKY09lk  https://t.co/iWVEQziv1s

Want to learn more about #Cardano & how all the development eras fit together? Get all of the updates in one place on our new, completely redesigned Cardano roadmap:  https://t.co/t1kjKYhKcS #CardanoCommunity #blockchain  https://t.co/U2zQWGnl6t
